bike.description: Platinum Series aluminum, G2 Geometry, butted TT & DT, cold-forged dropouts & BB

components.description: Shimano M525 disc hubs, Bontrager Duster tubeless-ready* 28mm wide disc rims, 32h
Bontrager Jones XR, 2.2 rear/2.25 front, 60 TPI aramid folding bead
Bontrager Race Big Sweep, 620mm width, 12d backsweep, 31.8mm
Avid Juicy 3, hydraulic disc, 160mm G2 Clean Sweep 6-bolt rotors
Bontrager QR seatbinder, chainstay protector, reflectors, Limited Lifetime Warranty
